column2: Australia denies banks interim approval to jointly negotiate with Apple on payment appsUPDATE 1-Australia denies banks interim approval to jointly negotiate with Apple on payment apps SYDNEY
column3: Aug 19 Australia's anti-trust regulator on Friday said it would not grant the country's three biggest banks interim approval to collectively negotiate with Apple Inc  to install their own electronic payments applications on iPhones.
